mapper.select: select ID, GROUPID, EMAIL, CLOSED_AT, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, UK_NUMBER, TOKEN, NOTE, GATEWAY, TOTAL_PRICE, SUBTOTAL_PRICE, TOTAL_TAX, CURRENCY, FINANCIAL_STATUS, FULFILLMENT_STATUS, CONFIRMED, TOTAL_DISCOUNTS, TOTAL_LINE_ITEMS_PRICE, CART_TOKEN, BUYER_ACCEPTS_MARKETING, TRADEID, REFERRING_SITE, LANDING_SITE, CANCELLED_AT, CANCEL_REASON, TOTAL_PRICE_USD, CHECKOUT_TOKEN, PROCESSED_AT, ORDER_NUMBER, PROCESSING_METHOD, CHECKOUT_ID, CONTACT_EMAIL, ORDER_STATUS_URL, COUNTRY_CODE, PROVINCE_CODE, BUYERNAME, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, CITY, ZIP, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, PHONE, PROVINCE, COUNTRY, SHIPPING_LINES_TITLE, SHIPPING_FEE, SHOPID, SHOPNAME from DB_SHOPIFYORDER where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
